title: Introducing: Ghost Brother
body:
Sometimes you just come across a band that’s really striking for some unidentifiable reason.

That’s **Ghost Brother**. for me.

Perusing Soundcloud’s bank of music, I came across the group and was immediately drawn to their music. It’s a mixture of compelling vocals, traditional instrumentals (notably the keyboard and guitar), and raw electronics. “World of Magic” is a perfect example of their usage of all of those elements in order to create a bizarre track _that works_.

Having just released their first tracks within the past month, I’m excited to see what else this group has in store.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/120774214″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]

**Edit: **A quick Google of the name ‘Govinda Clayton’, taken from Ghost Brother’s Soundcloud, throws up this result: http://music.cbc.ca/#/artists/Ghostbrothers

Seems Ghost Brother might just be the new incarnation of a different band. Definitely a change for the better….
